ResearchProjectDef.label: basic martial synstructs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Martial synstructs were developed well after the introduction of more civil variants and as those synstructs came to take on humanity's tendency for violent pursuits. The wWarrior synstruct is a simple drone designed for quantity over quality, while the so-called Bishop could possess sapience or be brought online as a drone to handle tasks where quality was more important.
